Reviews.Title: I think it will work well......
Reviews.Author: Dan
Reviews.Content: It looks just like the one that was sent without being put off for shipping concerns.  Something like it having to be added on another order?????

Reviews.Title: good solid product - exactly what I needed to go with "GW Security CCTV Male Plug Lead Power Cord"
Reviews.Author: Jeff Lawrence
Reviews.Content: I used this product with the "GW Security CCTV Male Plug Lead Power Cord Wire Male Power Pigtail" and they were a perfect match. The wires on this product are all black, as pictured. I used this to connect multiple strings of 12v LED strips.

ProductInfo.Features:
Saves Time, No Need To Cut Wire. All You Need Is a Screwdriver.
Pack of 10
Easy To Use
ProductInfo.Name: GW Security CCTV Female Power Pigtail Female Plug Lead Power Cord Wire for Connecting Security Camera, Pack of 10pcs
